amendment.description: Amendment requires states and school districts to provide a comparison of student subgroups with the state's annual goals and provide a description of the state's accountability system.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 107-69 to require states and school districts to provide a comparison of student subgroups with the state's annual goals and to provide a description of the state's accountability system, including a description of the criteria used by the state to evaluate school performance and to determine whether a school enters school improvement, corrective action or reconstitution.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Dooley amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
